What Sets Me Apart

I am hardworking and dedicated, eager to learn and develop, looking for my foothold in the world of programming

Constantly learning

In the last year I took advantage of the time I had to learn and develop and took 10 courses in programming, development and graphic design

Constantly developing

In the past year I have built over 20 projects as part of my learning process. No-Code projects, HTML & CSS projects, JavaScript projects, React projects and Fullstack projects

self disciplined

In the last year I have studied online on my own without an orderly framework of an educational institution and I have been able to persevere and set myself a strict agenda of studies and work on projects
